name: JJ Lehto
introduction: Jyrki Juhani Jrvilehto (Finnish:YUR-kee YAR-vee-LAY-toe, known as JJ Lehto (LAY-toe or LET-oh; born January 31, 1966 in Espoo, Greater Helsinki, Uusimaa, Finland) is a former Formula One racing driver who drove for Onyx, Scuderia Italia (Dallara), Sauber and Benetton during a 5 year career.  Lehto scored his one and only career podium at the 1991 San Marino Grand Prix.
